greeting.first: Hi {user}, I'm your personal idea scout :robot:, designed to help you find inspiring ideas in the form of TEDx talks from all over the world :bulb::earth:! Just enter a topic you're interested in and I'll give you some fitting suggestions.
greeting.back: Hi {user}, good to have you back! :victoryhand: I'd love to scout some more TEDx ideas :bulb: for you!

start.first: How would you like to get started?
start.back: What would you like to do?

restart.ask: Is there anything else youâ€™d like to do?

search.topic: Ok, what are you interested in?

continue.search: Would you like to get more inspiration on this topic?
continue.inspire: Would you like to get more inspiration?

end: Thanks for dropping by! Come back anytime for a further dose of inspiration. Talk to you soon! :wavinghand:
